item.description:
Bring your friends, colleagues, and classmates, and meet other young professionals, as you show your knowledge of global affairs to win prizes and contend for the title of

Boston's International Trivia Champion!

 

Come for the trivia and stay for the cheer! This will be an exciting evening, complete with apps and bevvies, networking, and a raffle.

Appetizers and two drinks are included with admission! Trivia and raffle prizes will include two Boston Celtics tickets, free bowling for 16 at Jillian's Boston, and a bottle of WhistlePig Straight Rye Whiskey!

 

Thursday, January 24

5:30 ~ 8:00 pm

 

Teams of 4-6 players will compete during 6 rounds of 8 questions each. Here's how the Night will flow:

 

5:30 - 6:00 pm: Registration, Networking, and complimentarytasting offered by WhistlePig Straight Rye Whiskey

 

6:00 - 6:30 pm: International Trivia Night -- Rounds 1 - 3

 

6:30 - 7:00 pm: Break and Mingling

 

7:00 - 7:30 pm: International Trivia Night -- Rounds 4 - 6

 

7:30 - 8:00 pm: Awarding of prizes, raffle drawing, and recognition of Boston's International Trivia Champion!

 

We encourage you to form teams in advance! Team members can register individually, or as a team by including all players in one registration. Players can also register individually and join a team on the 24th!

 

Please note that spaces are going fast, and we cannot guarantee registration after Wednesday, January 23.

 

I believe that there will be a Boston Rotaract group.  Please contact Jessica M via our FB group if you have any questions.  See the link below for registration information.

http://myemail.constantcontact.com/--1-Week--til-Food--Bevvies---Int-l-TRIVIA---Join-our-cause-on-Thurs--1-24.html?soid=1100352060452&aid=sqarw_2_Nhs

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Trivia Night to Benefit Global Education -- Thurs., January 24
